status_legend.0: Normal Operation - The turbine is in normal power production mode
status_legend.1: Derated Operation - Derated power generation with a power restriction
status_legend.2: Idling - Asset is idling and waits to operate again
status_legend.3: Service - Asset is in service mode / service team is at the site
status_legend.4: Downtime - Asset is down due a fault or other reasons

summary: Over this 6‑hour window the turbine spent all 37 ten‑minute intervals in Normal Operation, with generally steady winds (mean 5.04 m/s, std 0.50) and low, relatively stable power output (mean 0.092, std 0.031). Operational indicators were mostly steady (small rotor RPM variability, modest yaw misalignment ~2.07°, pitch mean −1.11), but the window is characterized by a consistent negative power residual (mean −0.094) aligned with the “power_deficit” tag. One notable anomaly in the summary stats is a very high reported wind speed maximum (28.1) relative to the otherwise tight wind distribution.
